EulerAnglesType
enum
Enum of Euler angles type.
Without considering the possibility of using two different convertions for the definition of the rotation axes , there exists twelve possible sequences of rotation axes, divided into two groups:
local: 在不考虑使用两种不同转换定义旋转轴的可能性的情况下，存在十二种可能的旋转轴序列，分为两组：

origin: Proper Euler angles (Z-X-Z, X-Y-X, Y-Z-Y, Z-Y-Z, X-Z-X, Y-X-Y)
Tait–Bryan angles (X-Y-Z, Y-Z-X, Z-X-Y, X-Z-Y, Z-Y-X, Y-X-Z).
The three elemental rotations may be
local: 三个元素的旋转可能是

origin: extrinsic
(rotations about the axes
xyz
of the original coordinate system, which is assumed to remain motionless), or
local: 原始坐标系的一部分，假定该坐标系保持静止），或

origin: intrinsic
(rotations about the axes of the rotating coordinate system
XYZ
, solidary with the moving body, which changes its orientation after each elemental rotation).
local: ，与移动体保持一致，移动体在每次元素旋转后改变其方向）。

origin: Extrinsic and intrinsic rotations are relevant.
local: 外在旋转和内在旋转是相关的。

origin: The definition of the Euler angles is as following,
\(\theta_1 \) represents the first rotation angle,
\(\theta_2 \) represents the second rotation angle,
\(\theta_3 \) represents the third rotation angle.
For intrinsic rotations in the order of X-Y-Z, the rotation matrix R can be calculated by:
local: 对于X-Y-Z顺序的固有旋转，旋转矩阵R可通过以下公式计算：

origin: \[R =X(\theta_1) Y(\theta_2) Z(\theta_3) \]
For extrinsic rotations in the order of X-Y-Z, the rotation matrix R can be calculated by:
local: 对于X-Y-Z顺序的非本征旋转，旋转矩阵R可通过以下公式计算：

origin: \[R =Z({\theta_3}) Y({\theta_2}) X({\theta_1})\]
where

\[X({\theta})={\begin{bmatrix}1&0&0\\0&\cos {\theta_1} &-\sin {\theta_1} \\0&\sin {\theta_1} &\cos {\theta_1} \\\end{bmatrix}}, Y({\theta})={\begin{bmatrix}\cos \theta_{2}&0&\sin \theta_{2}\\0&1 &0 \\\ -sin \theta_2& 0&\cos \theta_{2} \\\end{bmatrix}}, Z({\theta})={\begin{bmatrix}\cos\theta_{3} &-\sin \theta_3&0\\\sin \theta_3 &\cos \theta_3 &0\\0&0&1\\\end{bmatrix}}. \]
local: \[x（{\ theta}）={\ begin{bMatrix}1&amp；0&amp；0 \ 0&amp；\ n因为{\ theta 1}&amp；—没有{θ1}\ 0&amp；\ n没有{\ theta 1}&amp；cos{\ theta 1}\ end{bMatrix}，y（{\ theta}）={\ begin{bMatrix}\ cos \ theta 2}&amp；0（&amp；）没有θ{2}\ 0&amp；1&amp；0 \\没有θ2&amp；0（&amp；）cos \ theta{2}\ end{bMatrix}，Z（{\ theta}）={\ begin{bMatrix}\ cos \ theta{3}&amp；—sin \ theta 3&amp；0 \ sin \ theta 3&amp；\ ncos \ theta 3&amp；0 \ 0&amp；0&amp；%1 \\ \\结束{bMatrix}}。\]

origin: The function is designed according to this set of conventions:
local: 该函数是根据以下一组约定设计的：

origin: Right handed
reference frames are adopted, and the
local: 采用参考坐标系，并采用

origin: right hand rule
is used to determine the sign of angles.
Each matrix is meant to represent an
active rotation

(the composing and composed matrices are supposed to act on the coordinates of vectors defined in the initial fixed reference frame and give as a result the coordinates of a rotated vector defined in the same reference frame).
local: （合成矩阵和合成矩阵应作用于初始固定参考系中定义的向量的坐标，并作为结果给出同一参考系中定义的旋转向量的坐标）。

origin: For \(\theta_1\) and \(\theta_3\), the valid range is (−π, π].
local: 对于\（\theta\u 1\）和\（\theta\u 3\），有效范围为(−π, π].

origin: For \(\theta_2\), the valid range is [−π/2, π/2] or [0, π].
local: 对于\（\theta\u 2\），有效范围为[−π/2, π/2] 或[0，π].

origin: For Tait–Bryan angles, the valid range of \(\theta_2\) is [−π/2, π/2]. When transforming a quaternion to Euler angles, the solution of Euler angles is unique in condition of \( \theta_2 \in (−π/2, π/2)\) . If \(\theta_2 = −π/2 \) or \( \theta_2 = π/2\), there are infinite solutions. The common name for this situation is gimbal lock. For Proper Euler angles,the valid range of \(\theta_2\) is in [0, π]. The solutions of Euler angles are unique in condition of \( \theta_2 \in (0, π)\) . If \(\theta_2 =0 \) or \(\theta_2 =π \), there are infinite solutions and gimbal lock will occur.
local: 对于Tait–Bryan角，\（\theta\u 2\）的有效范围为[−π/2, π/2]. 将四元数转化为欧拉角时，欧拉角的解在\（\theta\u 2\ in）条件下是唯一的(−π/2, π/2)\) . 如果\（\θ2=−π/2\）或\（\θ2=π/2\），有无穷多个解。这种情况的通用名称是万向节锁。对于适当的欧拉角，\（\theta\u 2\）的有效范围在[0，π]. 欧拉角的解在\（\θ2\ in（0，π)\) . 如果\（\theta\u 2=0\）或\（\theta\u 2=π \), 有无限的解决方案和万向节锁将发生。
